title: Analysis of e-Learning Implementation Challenges in Higher Education Institutions in Sub-Saharan Africa

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Case-based education to understand the current status and challenges of e-learning adoption in Sub-Saharan Africa.

learning_goals: Three or more major technical and environmental constraints in e-learning implementation at higher education institutions in Sub-Saharan Africa can be explained
Locally adapted strategies for blended or fully online course operations can be proposed
Practical solutions to support effective e-learning in technology-limited environments (primarily smartphone-based) can be designed

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
